sentence: Perfect for a relaxing beach holiday
Jonathan and Rafael at the Excellence Club Beach Area were awesome
The staff especially Argenis and Wiliam welcoming guests Yesica in the excellence club and Jonathan on the beach was so attentive and helpful without pushing an agenda on its guests
We found the beach wide and expansive great place for a walk along the water
Beautiful hotel on the beach
Luis bartender by the beach was also a great guy to talk and laugh with
The beach is wonderful and private since this resort is not surrounded by other hotels and resorts
There are all kinds of drinks high quality brands provided in the rooms and wherever you find yourself by the pool or at the beach
If you want great service drinks breathtaking beach and quaint resort clean rooms than you have got it made
Excellent service provided by Rafael and Ines on the beach as well as Asopao
We spoke to numerous other couples who had experienced the same “ upgrade ” and everyone agreed that an ocean view is nowhere near as good as a swim up room
We went on the buggy tour excursion to Macau Beach where we passed a lot of local children
There are hundreds of covered lounges and chairs both polside and on the beach
Beautiful beaches but the waves were rough
If it is the beach you care about as a priority this is it
They took us out on a catamaran and we snorkeled and tried Snuba by the reef for a while
The beaches were very seawedy but I ’m told it was seasonal
If you are looking for the sounds of the waves and long walks on he beautiful beaches of Punta Cana you will not find it here
Covered lounge chairs on club side near ocean and bar service at times
Beach cleaned every day with more than enough beds all with shade

Not trying to be paranoid here but according to reviews theft is not unusual at this resort so we decided to be careful and took our money passports and electronics out to the beach which was inconvenient
Selective service depending on who you speak toExclusive beach area not needed in NovemberCoconutsCons
We walked for an hour along the beach in both directions

Carmen even showed me the room before they cleaned it to see if I wanted to spend the money this was upon my request because I wanted a better room closer to the beach not once was I pressured to upgrade
But we walked on the beach either direction for 1 2 kilometres several mornings

On our last visit we would venture around the pool areas and travel to the swim up bar a few times but this year we really felt at home in the Excellence area and stayed either on the beach or in the cascade pool in the courtyard area
We had a mix up with our beach dinner essentially they overboked for the number of couples that night and I ’l admit to getting quite upset having planned that day ’s schedule to accommodate it
Every day they were cleaning the beach
The beach is really nice but very windy
They are always smiling from the poor chaps who rake the seaweed from the beach to the reception staff and managers
